  16. (** Semaphores *)

  18. ‌type sem = {
  19.   mut: Mutex.t;                         (* protects [v] *)
  20.   mutable v: int;                       (* the current value *)
  21.   nonzero: Condition.t                  (* signaled when [v > 0] *)
  22. }

  24. module Counting = struct

  26. type t = sem

  28. let make v =
  29.   if v < 0 then invalid_arg "Semaphore.Counting.init: wrong initial value";
  30.   { mut = Mutex.create(); v; nonzero = Condition.create() }

  32. let release s =
  33.   Mutex.lock s.mut;
  34.   if s.v < max_int then begin
  35.     s.v <- s.v + 1;
  36.     Condition.signal s.nonzero;
  37.     Mutex.unlock s.mut
  38.   end else begin
  39.     Mutex.unlock s.mut;
  40.     raise (Sys_error "Semaphore.Counting.release: overflow")
  41.   end

  43. ‌let acquire s =
  44.   Mutex.lock s.mut;
  45.   while s.v = 0 do Condition.wait s.nonzero s.mut done;
  46.   s.v <- s.v - 1;
  47.   Mutex.unlock s.mut

  49. ‌let try_acquire s =
  50.   Mutex.lock s.mut;
  51.   let ret = if s.v = 0 then false else (s.v <- s.v - 1; true) in
  52.   Mutex.unlock s.mut;
  53.   ret

  55. ‌let get_value s = s.v

  57. end

  59. module Binary = struct

  61. type t = sem

  63. let make b =
  64.   { mut = Mutex.create();
  65.     v = if b then 1 else 0;
  66.     nonzero = Condition.create() }

  68. let release s =
  69.   Mutex.lock s.mut;
  70.   s.v <- 1;
  71.   Condition.signal s.nonzero;
  72.   Mutex.unlock s.mut

  74. let acquire s =
  75.   Mutex.lock s.mut;
  76.   while s.v = 0 do Condition.wait s.nonzero s.mut done;
  77.   s.v <- 0;
  78.   Mutex.unlock s.mut

  80. let try_acquire s =
  81.   Mutex.lock s.mut;
  82.   let ret = if s.v = 0 then false else (s.v <- 0; true) in
  83.   Mutex.unlock s.mut;
  84.   ret

  86. end
